meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Meg Khavari Joe Mastroeni Mike Nelson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6102.

td.p: Meg Khavari, a high school biology and religion teacher from Silver Spring, Maryland
Joe Mastroeni, a mutual funds analyst from Colt's Neck, New Jersey
Mike Nelson, a mechanical engineer from Geneva, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,001)

tr.td: BOOK NUMBERS
WHEN LIFE GIVES YOU LEMONS
NAME THAT PREZ
DRINKING VESSELS
HOCKEY
WHAT THE "ECK"
